guide_01_content: 为用户提供安全、可信赖的数字资产管理，风险识别，数据分析服务，携手用户，一起掘金一级市场。
guide_02_content: 您的私钥通过Secure Enclave在设备上本地加密，由您的生物识别技术和您选择的2FA保护，由您完全控制你的私钥和资产。
guide_03_content: 合约检测、恶意地址和NFT检测等工具，为BEE用户提供快速、可靠的风险识别。
guide_04_content: 链上投资数据分析可以幫助您根據项目的表現和評級引導您如何找到更好的投资，成为更好的投资者。
legal_tip: Please review the Bee Wallet Terms of Service and Privacy Notice.
legal_readed: I've read and accept the Terms of Service and  Privacy Notice.
createtip_01_content: If your recovery phrase is misplaced or stolen, it's the equivalent of losing your wallet. It's the only way to access your wallet if you forget your  account password.
createtip_02_content: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone.cannot be reset and Bee does not have access to it.
createtip_03_content: Write down your recovery phrase and keep it in a secure offline location. Do not store screenshots of it online.
createwallet_tip: Tip：you can important NFTs and set them as your avatar
createwallet_tip01: select an icon to use as your wallet avatar
backup_pleasewrite01: Copy it exactly on paper and store it in a safe place that only you know.
backup_pleaseselect: Please select the fill in order according to your recovery phrase you backed up.
importwallet_tip01: Input your 12/18/24-word recovery phrase you were given when you created your previous wallet - it could be an external wallet hosted by other applications.
importwallet_hint01: Please use space to separate the secret recoveryphrase
importwallet_hint02: Enter the private key or scan the QR code,case sensitive.
importwallet_hint03: Invalid Private Key,Please check your key.
importwallet_hint04: Invalid word, please check the spelling.
